<<MahApps:MetroWindow.WindowButtonCommands > <MahApps:WindowButtonCommands Style="{DynamicResource MahApps.Metro.Styles.WindowButtonCommands.Win10}" /> </MahApps:MetroWindow.WindowButtonCommands> <MahApps:MetroWindow.IconTemplate> <DataTemplate> <Grid Height="20" Width="20"> <Rectangle > <Rectangle.Fill> <VisualBrush Visual="{StaticResource appbar_3d_obj}" /> </Rectangle.Fill> </Rectangle> </Grid> </DataTemplate> </MahApps:MetroWindow.IconTemplate> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="150"/> <ColumnDefinition/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition/> <RowDefinition Height="25"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<!--status区--> <Grid Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"> <Label VerticalContentAlignment="Center" Padding="10,0,0,0" Margin="0"
Content="{Binding MainModel.Status,Mode=TwoWay}" Style="{DynamicResource LableStatus}" Grid.ColumnSpan="2" Foreground="White" > <Label.Resources> <Style x:Key="LableStatus"> <Style.Triggers> <Trigger Property="Label.Content" Value="Disconnect"> <Setter Property="Label.Background" Value="Red"/> </Trigger> <Trigger Property="Label.Content" Value="Connect"> <Setter Property="Label.Background" Value="Gray"/> </Trigger> <Trigger Property="Label.Content" Value="Please Insert LeapMotion"> <Setter Property="Label.Background" Value="##FFCA5100"/> </Trigger> </Style.Triggers> </Style> </Label.Resources> </Label>
</Grid>
<!--参数选择区--> <Grid Grid.Column="0" > <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="10"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition/> <ColumnDefinition/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<Label Content="选择手" Grid.Row="1" /> <ComboBox x:Name="comboBox" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="1"> <ComboBoxItem Content="手1"/> <ComboBoxItem Content="手2"/> </ComboBox> </Grid>
<!--内容显示区--> <Grid Grid.Column="1"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="50"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="50"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="50"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="50"/>
<ColumnDefinition Width="1*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition />
</Grid.RowDefinitions> <!--食指--> <Label Content="食指" Grid.Row="2"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.FingerBoneFirAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="1"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.FingerBoneSencondAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="2"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.FingerBoneThirdAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="3"/>
<!--大拇指--> <Label Content="大拇指" Grid.Row="1"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.FirFingerBoneFirAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.FirFingerBoneSencondAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="2"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.FirFingerBoneThirdAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="3"/>
<!--中指--> <Label Content="中指" Grid.Row="3"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.SecondFingerBoneFirAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="1"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.SecondFingerBoneSencondAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="2"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.SencondFingerBoneThirdAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="3"/>
<!--无名指--> <Label Content="无名指" Grid.Row="4"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.ThirdFirFingerBoneFirAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="1"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.ThirdFingerBoneSencondAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="2"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.ThirdFingerBoneThirdAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="3"/>
<!--小拇指--> <Label Content="小拇指" Grid.Row="5"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.LastFingerBoneFirAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="1"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.LastFingerBoneSencondAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="2"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.LastFingerBoneThirdAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="3"/> </Grid>
</Grid>.../>

Content="{Binding MainModel.Status,Mode=TwoWay}" Style="{DynamicResource LableStatus}" Grid.ColumnSpan="2" Foreground="White" > <Label.Resources> <Style x:Key="LableStatus"> <Style.Triggers> <Trigger Property="Label.Content" Value="Disconnect"> <Setter Property="Label.Background" Value="Red"/> </Trigger> <Trigger Property="Label.Content" Value="Connect"> <Setter Property="Label.Background" Value="Gray"/> </Trigger> <Trigger Property="Label.Content" Value="Please Insert LeapMotion"> <Setter Property="Label.Background" Value="##FFCA5100"/> </Trigger> </Style.Triggers> </Style> </Label.Resources> </Label>
</Grid>
<!--参数选择区--> <Grid Grid.Column="0" > <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="10"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition/> <ColumnDefinition/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<Label Content="选择手" Grid.Row="1" /> <ComboBox x:Name="comboBox" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="1"> <ComboBoxItem Content="手1"/> <ComboBoxItem Content="手2"/> </ComboBox> </Grid>
<!--内容显示区--> <Grid Grid.Column="1"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="50"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="50"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="50"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="50"/>
<ColumnDefinition Width="1*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition Height="30"/> <RowDefinition />
</Grid.RowDefinitions> <!--食指--> <Label Content="食指" Grid.Row="2"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.FingerBoneFirAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="1"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.FingerBoneSencondAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="2"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.FingerBoneThirdAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="3"/>
<!--大拇指--> <Label Content="大拇指" Grid.Row="1"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.FirFingerBoneFirAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.FirFingerBoneSencondAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="2"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.FirFingerBoneThirdAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="3"/>
<!--中指--> <Label Content="中指" Grid.Row="3"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.SecondFingerBoneFirAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="1"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.SecondFingerBoneSencondAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="2"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.SencondFingerBoneThirdAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="3"/>
<!--无名指--> <Label Content="无名指" Grid.Row="4"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.ThirdFirFingerBoneFirAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="1"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.ThirdFingerBoneSencondAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="2"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.ThirdFingerBoneThirdAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="3"/>
<!--小拇指--> <Label Content="小拇指" Grid.Row="5"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.LastFingerBoneFirAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="1"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.LastFingerBoneSencondAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="2"/> <Label Content="{Binding MainModel.LastFingerBoneThirdAngel,Mode=TwoWay}" Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="3"/> </Grid>
</Grid>.../>
